EsperJMX 5.3.0 API Documentation

EsperJMX consists of an Esper plug-in and EsperJMX endpoint API as well as a set of JMX MBeans for managing one or more Esper engine instances.

See: Description

JMX plug-in and endpoint API 
Package Description
com.espertech.esper.jmx.client
Esper plug-in, endpoint API and configuration.
JMX Esper MBeans 
Package Description
com.espertech.esper.jmx.mbean
MBean interfaces and exception classes.

EsperJMX consists of an Esper plug-in and EsperJMX endpoint API as well as a set of JMX MBeans for managing one or more Esper engine instances.

All public classes are found in the following packages:
  • com.espertech.esper.jmx.client
  • com.espertech.esper.jmx.mbean
